text: arau yisakale amara ayatasamuhara prati imana posana karae, sihamte yetiya tomara ocarata ahe tetiya sihamtaka tumi koraa, ‘tomalokara prati santi barsita ha'omka’, tomalokara pratipalake te'omra nijara oparata daya dharyya karai laiche. Tomalokara majara konoba'i yadi ajnatabasata asatkarma karae, tara pichata ta'oba karae arau nijake sansodhana karae, tente niscaya te'om (allaha) ksamasila, parama dayalu
